channel.title: Need help with panning
channel.description:
As a relatively new producer, I’m still very much learning how to do everything. Right now I’m focusing on getting better panning. Here’s a project I’m working on.
https://app.auxy.co/projects/udml22Eca5YlaYGO_Bmm7Q==
If people want to help, please let me know what I’ve done right and wrong in terms of panning. Edit the project if it helps to show.

item.title: Need help with panning
item.dc:creator: Octave
item.description:
Thanks, I’ll keep these tips in mind for future projects.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with panning
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
The house piano could use the delay ping pong to be at the left side since the instrument itself is panned to the right.
Maybe you can help the drums spread out by panning high hats to the side

https://app.auxy.co/projects/SZMb0TTpocjSr9kxKYfFNQ==
I’ve done some light tweaking to the project. Feel free to use it for your final track

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with panning
item.dc:creator: AnirudhKhanna
item.description:
I’m not the best one to talk about panning but dang that’s a really good work in progress
